tool_description: Recommends appropriate laboratory tests based on suspected diagnoses and clinical presentations to confirm or rule out conditions.

suspected_diagnoses.description: List of suspected diagnoses requiring laboratory confirmation

presenting_symptoms.description: Key symptoms that may guide test selection

existing_conditions.description: Known medical conditions that may affect test interpretation

current_medications.description: Current medications that may interfere with tests

error_messages: Missing required information: Provide suspected diagnoses, symptoms, and patient age.
Invalid age: Patient age must be between 0 and 150 years.
Invalid urgency level: Use stat, urgent, or routine.
Empty diagnoses list: Provide at least one suspected diagnosis.
No applicable tests: Unable to recommend tests for the provided diagnoses.
Test recommendation failed: Error occurred during test recommendation process.
usage: Input suspected diagnoses, symptoms, and patient information. The tool recommends appropriate laboratory tests with prioritization based on clinical utility and urgency.

test_priorities.description: Priority levels for each test: high, medium, low

test_rationales.description: Clinical rationale for each recommended test

expected_turnaround.description: Expected turnaround times for each test
